data.actual_result: The URL is broken and leads to a 404 error page. If you look at thr URL, you can see that the part after "" matches with the Facebook display name on the profile
data.expected_result: You should be redirected to the Facebook page of the user
data.short_description: Facebook links are broken in user profiles
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a user profile linked to Facebook - Open the link in your browser
